message.content: {"id": "18163", "title": "Add Import should ignore leading/trailing whitespace", "description": "When using Ctrl+M (Add Import), nothing happens if there is trailing whitespace within the selected text.", "OB": "When selecting text and using Ctrl+M (Add Import), if there is trailing whitespace within the selection, nothing happens.", "EB": "When selecting text and using Ctrl+M (Add Import), if there is trailing whitespace within the selection, the Add Import feature should still work correctly.", "SR": "The Add Import feature should be updated to ignore leading/trailing whitespace when used with Ctrl+M."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '18163', 'title': 'Bug 18163Add Import should ignore leading/trailing whitespace', 'description': 'Bug 18163Add Import should ignore leading/trailing whitespace ', 'OB': '', 'EB': '', 'SR': 'It often happens to me that I have selected i.e. When I then useCtrl+M (Add Import) nothing happens because of the trailing whitespace withinthe selection. '}
